concept.title: Removing an offline managed system Navigator item
concept.shortdesc: Use the Managed System Status workspace to clear offline managed systems from the Navigator view.

conbody.p: When a monitoring agent goes offline or its host name gets changed, its branch is dimmed in the Navigator, as in the following example, and its status is shown as *OFFLINE in any table view that uses the Current Managed Systems status query.

ul.li:
Enterprise
Windows Systems
MyComputer
Universal Agent
Windows OS
